content: with b k amount of felting rnds 6-10 with c k care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid rnds 11-12 with d k water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on round 13 with e k a towel rnds 14-16 with f k decrease with g round 17 with g *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end 35 sts round 18 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end 30 sts round 19 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end 25 sts round 20 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end 20 sts round 21 *k2tog repeat from * to end 10 sts round 22 *k2tog repeat from * to end 5 sts cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread rem sts and pull to close p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2020 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 02012020
